objects.name: Analytic 1098
objects.description: Detect runtime manipulation by monitoring system calls for modifications to shared libraries, ELF binaries, or environment variables that affect how data is displayed. Look for suspicious writes to application directories and mismatch in binary integrity baselines.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: open, write: File writes to application binaries or libraries at runtime

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of modified binaries or abnormal library load sequences

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Specific critical application binaries or libraries to monitor for unauthorized changes.
Interval for verifying hashes of executables and libraries.
